title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1718/97 of 3 September 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 658/96 on certain conditions for granting compensatory payments under the support system for producers of certain arable crops
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1718/97 of 3 September 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 658/96 on certain conditions for granting compensatory payments under the support system for producers of certain arable crops
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex IX to Regulation (EC) No 658/96 is hereby amended as follows:
1. the part relating to 'Finland` in Table 1 is deleted;
2. the parts relating to 'Finland` in Table 2 are replaced by the following:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 September 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
